title: Help - Am I eligible for loot this season?
body:
Hi,

I am a  League of Legends player who solely plays this game and have done so for about a year and 3/4 now...

A few hours ago I had to AFK in a flex queue game because I had to leave to help my mother who is very sick at hospital, because they thought she was going to have to have an operation. I only just got home now to return to find that I had gotten a leaver buster AFK (I don't even remember the last time I AFKed), of 5x 5 minute bans.

I want to know if I am now unable to receive my season ending rewards... Because when I got home I saw a message in the end screen that said: 

"You are ineligible to earn loot due to leaving or AFK behaviors."

These circumstances were completely out of my control, and I really hope someone can understand my situation if this is the case...

Additionally if the ineligibility to earn loot can be removed by simply playing 5 games to remove the ban, I will happily do so.

Thank you and kudos to the Riot team.

replies.body: It looks like your loot eligibility has been restored as you've completed the required [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) matches.  Leaverbuster does not impact your end of season rewards so you should be fine.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Thank you! I was quite worried... :)
